smart_goals.description: Check and log blood glucose levels 4 times daily (before meals and at bedtime) for the next 4 weeks, aiming for fasting glucose between 80-130 mg/dL and post-meal readings under 180 mg/dL
Lose 20 pounds over the next 6 months (from 185 lbs to 165 lbs) by following a balanced nutrition plan limiting carbohydrates to 45-60 grams per meal
Complete 150 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise (brisk walking, swimming, or cycling) per week, divided into 30-minute sessions 5 times per week
Perform strength training exercises 2-3 times per week for the next 3 months to improve insulin sensitivity
Schedule and complete both an annual eye exam and foot check within the next 30 days for preventive care
Reduce blood pressure from 135/85 mmHg to below 130/80 mmHg within 3 months through reduced sodium intake and regular exercise
Lower LDL cholesterol from 120 mg/dL to below 100 mg/dL within 3 months by incorporating omega-3 rich foods (fatty fish, walnuts) into diet at least 3 times per week
